user.title: Configure Power Average Calculator
user.description: Select the current and voltage entities for each phase. Current values will be treated as 0 when negative (export).

power_targets.title: Power Targets (Optional)
power_targets.description: Add power targets in Watts to create estimated window sensors. Each target will create a sensor that estimates what the completed window average would be if that power is added for the remainder of the window.
